leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 神经科学-电生理与神经信号生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→事件/分选→解码→实时→评测
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 实时系统 + 分析库 + GUI

unit.unit_name: 信号预处理/去噪/事件检测

tools.name: MNE-Preprocessing
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for EEG artifact reduction and preprocessing based on MNE-Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python repository providing a step-by-step approach to reduce artifacts from electroencephalographic (EEG) raw data using basic and unanimous approaches, serving as a wrapper or pipeline around MNE-Python functionalities.

tools.name: DeepDenoiser
tools.one_line_profile: Deep neural network for seismic signal denoising and decomposition
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool designed for the denoising and decomposition of seismic signals, utilizing deep neural networks to separate signal from noise in time-series data, which shares methodological similarities with electrophysiological signal processing.

tools.name: PyEEGLab
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for EEG data analysis and manipulation
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to analyze and manipulate Electroencephalography (EEG) data, providing functionalities for handling EEG datasets and performing basic analysis tasks.

tools.name: aind-ephys-spikesort-kilosort25-full
tools.one_line_profile: CodeOcean capsule for electrophysiology spike sorting pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A full electrophysiology analysis pipeline using Kilosort2.5 via SpikeInterface, developed by the Allen Institute for Neural Dynamics, designed for automated spike sorting workflows.

tools.name: ATST-SED
tools.one_line_profile: Sound Event Detection model using Audio Spectrogram Transformer
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation for fine-tuning the pretrained ATST (Audio Spectrogram Transformer) model for sound event detection tasks, applicable in bioacoustics and environmental sound analysis.

tools.name: EEGapp
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB application for automated EEG data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based graphical application designed to automate the analysis of EEG data, facilitating preprocessing and feature extraction for researchers.

tools.name: EMS-YOLO
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Directly-Trained Spiking Neural Networks for Object Detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a Spiking Neural Network (SNN) based object detection model (EMS-YOLO), leveraging neuromorphic computing principles for efficient vision tasks.

tools.name: SpikeYOLO
tools.one_line_profile: Spike-Driven Inference Spiking Neural Network for Object Detection
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance and energy-efficient object detection model using integer-valued training and spike-driven inference, contributing to the field of neuromorphic vision.

tools.name: BRAVEHEART
tools.one_line_profile: Automated electrocardiographic and vectorcardiographic analysis software
tools.detailed_description: Open-source software designed for the automated analysis of electrocardiographic (ECG) and vectorcardiographic (VCG) signals, supporting clinical and research applications in cardiology.

tools.name: Homer3
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB application for fNIRS data processing and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A widely used MATLAB application for the processing, analysis, and visualization of functional Near-Infrared Spectroscopy (fNIRS) data, enabling hemodynamic response estimation.

tools.name: bemobil-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for mobile brain/body imaging (MoBI) data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox that wraps EEGLAB and MOBILAB functionalities to provide a streamlined pipeline for analyzing and visualizing mobile brain/body imaging data, handling synchronization and artifact removal.

tools.name: csc-eeg-tools
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB functions for EEG IO and preprocessing
tools.detailed_description: A collection of MATLAB functions for EEG input/output, preprocessing, and analysis, developed by the Center for Sleep and Consciousness at the University of Wisconsin.

tools.name: CereLink
tools.one_line_profile: Interface library for Blackrock Neurotech Neural Signal Processors
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library and interface for communicating with Blackrock Neurotech's Cerebus Neural Signal Processors, facilitating real-time neural data acquisition and processing.

tools.name: ECGI_GAN
tools.one_line_profile: GAN-based denoising for Electrocardiographic Imaging (ECGI)
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model applying Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) to denoise Electrocardiographic Imaging (ECGI) signals, improving signal quality for cardiac analysis.

tools.name: DESED_task
tools.one_line_profile: Baseline and tools for Domestic Environment Sound Event Detection
tools.detailed_description: The official repository for the DCASE Domestic Environment Sound Event Detection (DESED) task, providing baseline systems, data preparation scripts, and evaluation tools for sound event detection research.

tools.name: dcase_util
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for Detection and Classification of Acoustic Scenes and Events
tools.detailed_description: A collection of utility functions and classes for working with audio data in the context of Detection and Classification of Acoustic Scenes and Events (DCASE), supporting data handling, feature extraction, and evaluation.

tools.name: OpenMuse
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for recording and streaming data from Muse S Athena EEG headbands
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to interface with Muse S Athena headbands, enabling the recording and streaming of EEG signals for neuroscience research and brain-computer interface applications.

tools.name: Cell-Assembly-Detection
tools.one_line_profile: Method for cell assembly detection in parallel spike trains
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of statistical methods for detecting cell assemblies (groups of co-firing neurons) in parallel spike train data, developed by the Durstewitz Lab.

tools.name: warblePy
tools.one_line_profile: Bioacoustic and Electrophysiology Data Analysis Package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package developed by the Dynamical Systems Lab for analyzing bioacoustic and electrophysiological data, providing tools for signal processing and feature extraction.

tools.name: ripple_detection
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for identifying sharp wave ripple events using LFPs
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for detecting sharp wave ripples (SWRs) in local field potential (LFP) data, commonly used in hippocampal neurophysiology research.

tools.name: spectral_connectivity
tools.one_line_profile: Frequency domain estimation and connectivity analysis tools
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for computing multitaper spectral estimates and functional/directed connectivity measures (coherence, Granger causality) for electrophysiological data.

tools.name: sleeptrip
tools.one_line_profile: FieldTrip extension for sleep analysis functionality
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox extension for FieldTrip (MATLAB) specifically designed for sleep research, adding functionality for sleep scoring, spindle detection, and other sleep-related EEG analyses.

tools.name: PyCartool
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for I/O between Cartool and Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python library facilitating data exchange (I/O) between the Cartool neuroimaging software and the Python ecosystem, enabling analysis of Cartool data in Python.

tools.name: MiV-OS
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis pipeline for electrophysiology MiV-system and simulator
tools.detailed_description: An analysis pipeline and simulation environment designed for the MiV-system electrophysiology setup, developed by the Gazzola Lab.

tools.name: E2E-PPG
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-End PPG Processing Pipeline for Wearables
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python pipeline for processing Photoplethysmography (PPG) signals, including quality assessment, motion artifact removal, and heart rate/HRV feature extraction.

tools.name: IUSM-ConnPipe
tools.one_line_profile: Neuroscience connectivity pipeline for MRI data preprocessing
tools.detailed_description: A bash/Python pipeline from IU School of Medicine for pre-processing anatomical, functional, and diffusion MRI data to perform connectivity analysis.

tools.name: WaveSurfer
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB application for electrophysiology data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based application developed by Janelia Research Campus for acquiring, visualizing, and analyzing electrophysiology data.

tools.name: PixelProcessingPipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for processing Neuropixels and Myomatrix data
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox designed to automate the processing of data recorded from Neuropixels and Myomatrix probes, streamlining the electrophysiology analysis workflow.

tools.name: Preprocessing_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Intracranial EEG pre-processing steps in SPM12 and Matlab
tools.detailed_description: A collection of MATLAB scripts and SPM12 procedures for pre-processing intracranial EEG (iEEG) data, developed by the LBCN at Stanford.

tools.name: Spyglass
tools.one_line_profile: Neuroscience data analysis framework for reproducible research
tools.detailed_description: A data analysis framework designed for reproducible research in neuroscience, specifically handling complex data pipelines for electrophysiology and related data.

tools.name: esinet
tools.one_line_profile: EEG inverse solution with artificial neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A package for solving the EEG inverse problem using artificial neural networks, designed to integrate seamlessly with MNE-Python data structures.

tools.name: MiniAnalysis
tools.one_line_profile: Matlab software for measuring miniature events in patch clamp electrophysiology
tools.detailed_description: MATLAB software designed for the detection and measurement of frequency and amplitude of miniature events in patch clamp electrophysiology data.

tools.name: OEvent
tools.one_line_profile: Neural oscillation event detection and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the detection and analysis of neural oscillation events, developed by the Nathan Kline Institute.

tools.name: Elephant
tools.one_line_profile: Electrophysiology Analysis Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: Elephant (Electrophysiology Analysis Toolkit) is an open-source library for the analysis of electrophysiological data, including spike trains, LFPs, and analog signals.

tools.name: pyelectro
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of electrophysiology in Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for the analysis of electrophysiological data, providing functions to extract features from voltage traces.

tools.name: FLUX
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for analysis of MEG data using MNE Python
tools.detailed_description: The FLUX pipeline provides a standardized workflow for the analysis of Magnetoencephalography (MEG) data, built on top of MNE-Python.

tools.name: nirstorm
tools.one_line_profile: Brainstorm plugin for fNIRS data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the Brainstorm software dedicated to the analysis of functional Near-Infrared Spectroscopy (fNIRS) data.

tools.name: DOMINO-SEE
tools.one_line_profile: Detection Of Multi-layer INterconnected Occurrences for Spatial Extreme Events
tools.detailed_description: A tool for detecting multi-layer interconnected occurrences for spatial extreme events, likely used in climate or earth science research.

tools.name: rippl-AI
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning approaches for sharp-wave ripple detection
tools.detailed_description: An open toolbox containing several machine learning approaches for the detection of sharp-wave ripples in electrophysiological data.

tools.name: SpikeInterface
tools.one_line_profile: A unified Python framework for spike sorting and extracellular electrophysiology data analysis
tools.detailed_description: SpikeInterface is a Python module designed to unify and simplify the analysis of extracellular electrophysiology data. It provides a flexible and robust platform for building spike sorting pipelines, wrapping multiple external spike sorters (e.g., Kilosort, IronClust) into a common interface. It handles data preprocessing, sorting, post-processing, and validation.

tools.name: SpikeInterface-GUI
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical user interface for the SpikeInterface electrophysiology analysis framework
tools.detailed_description: SpikeInterface-GUI provides a desktop-based graphical interface for visualizing and curating the results of spike sorting pipelines built with SpikeInterface. It allows researchers to inspect waveforms, cross-correlograms, and spike trains interactively.

tools.name: BLINKER
tools.one_line_profile: Automated pipeline for detecting and correcting eye blink artifacts in EEG data
tools.detailed_description: BLINKER (EEG-Blinks) is a MATLAB toolbox designed to automatically detect, characterize, and correct eye blink artifacts in EEG signals. It provides a standardized pipeline for handling one of the most common sources of noise in electroencephalography.

tools.name: EEG-Clean-Tools
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of MATLAB tools for standardized EEG signal preprocessing
tools.detailed_description: EEG-Clean-Tools provides a set of MATLAB functions and pipelines for cleaning EEG data. It focuses on standardized preprocessing steps, including filtering, artifact rejection, and signal quality assessment, often used in conjunction with the BLINKER toolbox.

tools.name: NeuroRA
tools.one_line_profile: A Python toolbox for multimode neural data representation analysis
tools.detailed_description: NeuroRA is a comprehensive Python toolbox designed for Representational Analysis of neural data. It supports various advanced analysis methods including Representational Similarity Analysis (RSA), Neural Pattern Similarity (NPS), Spatiotemporal Pattern Similarity (STPS), and Inter-Subject Correlation (ISC), facilitating the decoding of neural information from EEG, MEG, fMRI, and other modalities.

tools.name: BrainBeats
tools.one_line_profile: EEGLAB plugin for joint processing of EEG and cardiovascular signals
tools.detailed_description: The BrainBeats toolbox is an EEGLAB plugin designed to allow joint processing and analysis of EEG and cardiovascular signals (ECG/PPG), facilitating research into heart-brain interactions.

tools.name: DSI (Distributed Source Imaging)
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed EEG source imaging toolbox for EEGLAB
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox for EEGLAB that provides distributed source imaging capabilities, allowing researchers to estimate brain source activity from scalp EEG signals.

tools.name: headModel
tools.one_line_profile: Head modeling toolbox for EEG forward and inverse problems
tools.detailed_description: The headModel toolbox for MATLAB/EEGLAB encapsulates common routines for EEG forward and inverse problems in a single interface, facilitating electromagnetic source imaging.

tools.name: LORETA-KEY Plugin
tools.one_line_profile: EEGLAB plugin to export data to LORETA-KEY software
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for EEGLAB that facilitates the export of EEG data to the LORETA-KEY software for source localization analysis.

tools.name: Microstate EEGlab toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for EEG microstate analysis within EEGLAB
tools.detailed_description: An EEGLAB toolbox dedicated to the analysis of EEG microstates, providing methods for identifying and quantifying quasi-stable voltage topographies.

tools.name: NeuroExpress
tools.one_line_profile: Patch clamp data analysis software
tools.detailed_description: Software designed for the analysis of patch clamp electrophysiological data, facilitating the processing of neuronal recordings.

tools.name: autoreject
tools.one_line_profile: Automated rejection and repair of bad trials/sensors in M/EEG
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for automated artifact rejection and sensor repair in MEG and EEG data, designed to work with the MNE-Python ecosystem.

tools.name: pyret
tools.one_line_profile: Python tools for analysis of neurophysiology data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing tools for the analysis of neurophysiological data, with a focus on retinal physiology and spike train analysis.

tools.name: nigeLab
tools.one_line_profile: Neurophysiological data analysis toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for neurophysiological data analysis, designed to bridge engineering methods with physiological applications.

tools.name: PyMNE.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia interface to MNE-Python
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package that provides an interface to the MNE-Python library, allowing users to access MNE's EEG/MEG analysis capabilities directly from Julia.

tools.name: mne_tools
tools.one_line_profile: Helper tools for MNE-Python EEG analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of utility functions and tools to extend the functionality of the MNE-Python toolbox for EEG data analysis.

tools.name: PyTorch Geometric Temporal
tools.one_line_profile: Spatiotemporal Signal Processing with Neural Machine Learning Models
tools.detailed_description: A temporal extension library for PyTorch Geometric, designed for deep learning on dynamic graphs and spatiotemporal signals, applicable to brain connectivity analysis and other scientific domains.

tools.name: EEGLAB-specparam
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB wrapper for the spectral parametrization (FOOOF) toolkit
tools.detailed_description: An EEGLAB plugin that wraps the FOOOF (Fitting Oscillations & One Over F) algorithm, allowing for spectral parametrization of EEG data within the EEGLAB environment.

tools.name: BEST Toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Behavioral State Analysis using EEG
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for behavioral state analysis using EEG, including tools for automated sleep classification of long-term iEEG data and artifact removal.

tools.name: Brainstorm
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive open-source application for MEG, EEG, fNIRS, ECoG, sEEG, and electrophysiology analysis
tools.detailed_description: Brainstorm is a collaborative, open-source application dedicated to the analysis of brain recordings: MEG, EEG, fNIRS, ECoG, sEEG, and multi-unit electrophysiology. It provides a rich graphical interface and a comprehensive scripting environment for data visualization, artifact removal, source estimation, and statistical analysis.

tools.name: ecogVIS
tools.one_line_profile: Time series visualizer and data processing tool for ECoG signals in NWB format
tools.detailed_description: ecogVIS is a Python-based tool designed for the visualization and processing of Electrocorticography (ECoG) signals stored in Neurodata Without Borders (NWB) files. It allows users to inspect time-series data, visualize spectral features, and perform basic signal processing tasks directly on NWB datasets.

tools.name: RoiExtractors
tools.one_line_profile: Library for extracting and handling optical imaging data (ROI) inspired by SpikeInterface
tools.detailed_description: RoiExtractors is a Python module for handling optical imaging data, specifically focused on extracting regions of interest (ROIs) and converting between file formats. It is designed to work within the neurophysiology ecosystem, complementing tools like SpikeInterface for optical physiology (calcium imaging).

tools.name: Meggie
tools.one_line_profile: User-friendly GUI for MNE-python based MEG and EEG analysis
tools.detailed_description: Meggie is a graphical user interface (GUI) built on top of MNE-python, designed to facilitate MEG and EEG data analysis. It allows users to perform preprocessing, epoching, and averaging across multiple subjects without writing code, making advanced neurophysiological analysis accessible.

tools.name: Connectome Mapper 3
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS App for multi-modal brain processing pipelines (MRI, Diffusion, EEG)
tools.detailed_description: Connectome Mapper 3 is a BIDS App that implements full anatomical, diffusion, resting-state functional MRI, and EEG processing pipelines. It processes raw data (T1, DWI, BOLD, EEG) to generate multi-resolution brain parcellations and connection matrices, facilitating connectomics research.

tools.name: restingIAF
tools.one_line_profile: EEGLAB plugin for estimating resting-state individual alpha frequency
tools.detailed_description: restingIAF is a tool (often used as an EEGLAB plugin) for estimating the individual alpha frequency (IAF) from resting-state EEG data. It provides methods to characterize the spectral peak in the alpha band, which is a key biomarker in electrophysiological research.

tools.name: phylib
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight Python library for electrophysiological data analysis
tools.detailed_description: phylib is a lightweight library for loading and manipulating electrophysiological data, specifically designed to work with the output of spike sorting algorithms like Kilosort. It is part of the Cortex Lab ecosystem (Phy) and provides utilities for handling spike clusters, waveforms, and templates.

tools.name: discover-eeg
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for automatic preprocessing, analysis, and visualization of resting state EEG
tools.detailed_description: discover-eeg is a MATLAB-based pipeline designed to automate the preprocessing, analysis, and visualization of resting-state EEG data. It streamlines the workflow from raw data to actionable insights and visualizations, suitable for batch processing of EEG datasets.

tools.name: Wave_clus
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised spike detection and sorting algorithm using wavelets
tools.detailed_description: Wave_clus is a fast and unsupervised algorithm for spike detection and sorting. It utilizes wavelet transforms for feature extraction and super-paramagnetic clustering to automatically classify neuronal spikes from extracellular recordings.

tools.name: DIPY
tools.one_line_profile: Library for analysis and visualization of diffusion magnetic resonance imaging (dMRI) data
tools.detailed_description: DIPY (Diffusion Imaging In Python) is a comprehensive library for the analysis of diffusion magnetic resonance imaging (dMRI) data. It provides methods for reconstruction, tracking, registration, and visualization of medical imaging data, serving as a core tool in computational anatomy and neuroimaging.

tools.name: MVPAlab
tools.one_line_profile: Matlab toolbox for Multi-Variate Pattern Analysis (MVPA) of EEG/MEG data
tools.detailed_description: MVPAlab is a Matlab toolbox designed for Multi-Variate Pattern Analysis (MVPA) and decoding of electrophysiological data (EEG/MEG). It facilitates the application of machine learning classifiers to time-resolved brain data to study neural representations.

tools.name: eegsynth
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time EEG signal processing and sonification tool
tools.detailed_description: A modular framework for converting real-time EEG signals into sounds, music, and visual effects, often used for neurofeedback and art-science experiments.

tools.name: eegtools-matlab-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB-based EEG analysis pipeline framework
tools.detailed_description: A complete EEG analysis framework wrapping EEGLAB and BRAINSTORM functionalities to streamline processing workflows.

tools.name: Syncopy
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale electrophysiology data analysis framework
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for user-friendly analysis of large-scale electrophysiology data, designed for systems neuroscience.

tools.name: mwf-artifact-removal
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-channel Wiener Filter for EEG artifact removal
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of the Multi-channel Wiener Filter (MWF) for removing artifacts from EEG data.

tools.name: ArduPi-ECG
tools.one_line_profile: ECG/HRV signal processing and analysis toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for full HRV analysis and signal processing (Fourier, Wavelet, etc.) of ECG data from sensors.

tools.name: FieldTrip
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive toolbox for MEG, EEG and iEEG analysis
tools.detailed_description: A widely used MATLAB toolbox for the analysis of MEG, EEG, and invasive electrophysiological data, covering preprocessing, spectral analysis, source reconstruction, and statistics.

tools.name: PyEEG
tools.one_line_profile: Feature extraction library for EEG/MEG data
tools.detailed_description: A Python module for extracting features from EEG and MEG signals, including fractal dimension, entropy, and spectral features.

tools.name: ICEEMDAN-for-MT
tools.one_line_profile: ICEEMDAN algorithm for magnetotelluric signal denoising
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the ICEEMDAN (Improved Complete Ensemble EMD with Adaptive Noise) algorithm specifically for denoising magnetotelluric (MT) low-frequency signals.

tools.name: InVivoTools
tools.one_line_profile: Neurophysiology tools for visual stimulation and data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A set of neurophysiology tools, forked from VanHooserTools, containing tools for visual stimulation and analysis of calcium imaging and extracellular electrophysiology data.

tools.name: EEGWave
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for analyzing temporal progression of brain oscillatory activity
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB semi-automated toolbox to quantitatively analyze the temporal progression of brain oscillatory activity in multiple free-running LFP recordings. It calculates time-frequency spectra, detects oscillatory events, and calculates linear coherence.

tools.name: CTAP
tools.one_line_profile: Computational Testing for Automated Preprocessing of EEG
tools.detailed_description: A Matlab toolbox extending EEGLAB functionality for batch processing of EEG data, providing automated preprocessing pipelines.

tools.name: DeePhys
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis tool for extracellular recordings on HD-MEAs
tools.detailed_description: A tool created to facilitate the analysis of extracellular recordings of neuronal cultures using high-density microelectrode arrays (HD-MEAs).

tools.name: Opticka
tools.one_line_profile: Experiment manager for psychophysics and neurophysiology
tools.detailed_description: An experiment manager built on top of the Psychophysics toolbox (PTB) for MATLAB. It runs experimental tasks using flexible state machine logic and integrates with eyetrackers and neurophysiology data collection systems.

tools.name: MARA
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic artifact rejection plug-in for EEGLAB
tools.detailed_description: An EEGLAB Plug-In for automatic artifact rejection in EEG data, automating the cleaning process.

tools.name: eeglabio
tools.one_line_profile: I/O support for EEGLAB files in Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing input/output support for EEGLAB data formats, facilitating interoperability between MATLAB and Python EEG workflows.

tools.name: gphys
tools.one_line_profile: R package for electrophysiology data analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to analyse electrophysiology data acquired by Neuromatic or Igor Pro.

tools.name: detectSWDs
tools.one_line_profile: Detection of spike-wave discharges in epileptic animals
tools.detailed_description: Matlab scripts specifically designed for the detection of spike-wave discharges (SWDs) in EEG data from epileptic animal models.

tools.name: ephys
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for high-throughput electrophysiology data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of MATLAB scripts for processing and analyzing high-throughput electrophysiology data.

tools.name: SpikeProp
tools.one_line_profile: Spiking neural network for heart sound beat detection
tools.detailed_description: A spiking neural network implementation using the SpikeProp algorithm for improving beat detection in heart sound signals.

tools.name: eegpreproc
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for EEG data preprocessing
tools.detailed_description: A Matlab code pipeline and manual for preprocessing EEG data, standardizing the cleaning and preparation steps.

tools.name: rteeg
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time EEG streaming and analysis module
tools.detailed_description: A Python module designed to stream and analyze EEG data in real-time. (Note: Project suggests using MNE-Python, but remains a distinct tool).

tools.name: EEG-ICA-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: ICA preprocessing and source localization pipeline for EEG
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB pipeline for Independent Component Analysis (ICA) preprocessing and source localization of EEG data.

tools.name: keypy
tools.one_line_profile: Library for EEG preprocessing and microstate analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for EEG preprocessing, spectral analysis, and microstate analysis.

tools.name: QuantMeta
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for absolute abundance determination in metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: QuantMeta determines the absolute abundance of targets in metagenomes spiked with synthetic DNA standards, establishing detection thresholds and correcting mapping errors.

tools.name: spikedetekt
tools.one_line_profile: Spike detection for large dense electrode arrays
tools.detailed_description: A tool for electrophysiological spike detection designed for large dense electrode arrays, part of the KlustaSuite.

tools.name: COSDD
tools.one_line_profile: Correlated and Signal-Dependent Denoising
tools.detailed_description: A method and tool for correlated and signal-dependent denoising, typically applied in scientific imaging (e.g., microscopy).

tools.name: pylossless
tools.one_line_profile: EEG processing pipeline for continuous data annotation
tools.detailed_description: An EEG processing pipeline that annotates continuous data, designed to be lossless and automated.

tools.name: BrainFusion
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for analyzing multimodal physiological signals (EEG, EMG, ECG, fNIRS)
tools.detailed_description: BrainFusion is an open-source Python platform designed for the analysis of multimodal physiological signals. It provides modules for preprocessing, feature extraction, and coupling analysis (e.g., neurovascular coupling, brain-heart interactions), supporting BIDS-compliant workflows.

tools.name: quickspikes
tools.one_line_profile: Fast spike detection and extraction library
tools.detailed_description: Quickspikes is a Python library developed for fast and efficient spike detection and extraction from neural recordings. It provides implementations of common threshold-based spike detection algorithms suitable for large-scale electrophysiological data.

tools.name: Automagic
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic preprocessing toolbox for EEG data
tools.detailed_description: Automagic is a MATLAB-based toolbox for the automatic preprocessing of EEG datasets. It wraps EEGLAB functions to provide a standardized, quality-controlled pipeline for artifact removal, interpolation, and filtering.

tools.name: SOMATA
tools.one_line_profile: State-space Oscillator Modeling And Time-series Analysis
tools.detailed_description: SOMATA is a Python library for state-space neural signal processing. It focuses on oscillator modeling and time-series analysis to characterize neural dynamics, developed by the Purdon Lab.

tools.name: MNE-BIDS
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS data handling for MNE-Python
tools.detailed_description: MNE-BIDS is a Python package that facilitates reading and writing neuroimaging datasets in the Brain Imaging Data Structure (BIDS) format, integrating seamlessly with the MNE-Python ecosystem.

tools.name: MNE-BIDS-Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Automated processing pipeline for MNE-BIDS datasets
tools.detailed_description: A full-featured pipeline for processing electrophysiological data (MEG, EEG) formatted according to BIDS. It automates steps from preprocessing to source estimation using MNE-Python.

tools.name: MNE-Connectivity
tools.one_line_profile: Connectivity analysis for MNE-Python
tools.detailed_description: A library for calculating functional and effective connectivity measures (coherence, Granger causality, etc.) on MNE-Python data structures.

tools.name: MNE-CPP
tools.one_line_profile: C++ framework for real-time electrophysiology
tools.detailed_description: MNE-CPP is a cross-platform C++ framework for data acquisition, visualization, and real-time processing of MEG and EEG data, compatible with MNE concepts.

tools.name: mne-denoise
tools.one_line_profile: Narrow-band artifact removal for MNE-Python
tools.detailed_description: mne-denoise provides specialized tools for removing narrow-band artifacts (like power-line noise) from electrophysiological data using harmonic regression techniques, designed to integrate with MNE-Python workflows.

tools.name: MNE-HCP
tools.one_line_profile: Library for processing Human Connectome Project (HCP) MEG data using MNE-Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that provides a set of tools to read, process, and analyze Magnetoencephalography (MEG) data from the Human Connectome Project (HCP), integrating seamlessly with the MNE-Python ecosystem.

tools.name: mne-hfo
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for estimating and computing high-frequency oscillations (HFOs) from iEEG data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library compatible with MNE and BIDS for the detection and analysis of High-Frequency Oscillations (HFOs) in intracranial EEG (iEEG) data, providing a scikit-learn style API.

tools.name: mne-lsl
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for real-time brain signal streaming with MNE-Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for real-time streaming and processing of neurophysiological signals (EEG/MEG) using the Lab Streaming Layer (LSL) protocol, integrated with MNE-Python for online analysis.

tools.name: MNE-Python
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive library for MEG and EEG data analysis
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python software package for exploring, visualizing, and analyzing human neurophysiological data (MEG, EEG, sEEG, ECoG, NIRS, etc.), providing a wide range of algorithms for preprocessing, source estimation, and statistical analysis.

tools.name: mne-qt-browser
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance 2D data browser backend for MNE-Python
tools.detailed_description: A specialized visualization tool serving as a backend for MNE-Python, utilizing Qt to provide fast and interactive 2D browsing of MEG/EEG data traces.

tools.name: mne-r
tools.one_line_profile: Interface for accessing MNE-Python functionality from R
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper library that allows R users to utilize the functionality of MNE-Python for MEG and EEG data analysis directly within the R environment.

tools.name: mne-realtime
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time data analysis extension for MNE-Python
tools.detailed_description: A library for real-time processing and analysis of MEG/EEG data, designed to work with MNE-Python for online feedback and monitoring applications.

tools.name: mne-rsa
tools.one_line_profile: Representational Similarity Analysis (RSA) for MEG and EEG data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for performing Representational Similarity Analysis (RSA) on neuroimaging data (MEG/EEG), allowing researchers to relate brain activity patterns to computational models or behavioral measures.

tools.name: naplib-python
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for neural data processing and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python package containing tools and functions for processing and analyzing neural data, including auditory cortex analysis and general electrophysiology utilities.

tools.name: DeepSeparator
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for EEG artifact removal
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based tool designed to separate and remove artifacts (such as EOG and EMG) from EEG signals, improving signal quality for downstream analysis.

tools.name: nelpy
tools.one_line_profile: Neuroelectrophysiology object model and data analysis library
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing a common object model and set of tools for analyzing neuroelectrophysiology data, focusing on spike trains, local field potentials, and behavioral data.

tools.name: NeuroDSP
tools.one_line_profile: Digital signal processing for neural time series
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox for analyzing neural time series data, providing tools for spectral analysis, filtering, burst detection, and rhythm analysis.

tools.name: SpikeWrap
tools.one_line_profile: Package to manage electrophysiology analysis pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to wrap and manage electrophysiology analysis workflows, particularly facilitating the use of SpikeInterface for sorting and preprocessing.

tools.name: NeuroKit2
tools.one_line_profile: Python toolbox for neurophysiological signal processing
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python package for processing physiological signals (ECG, PPG, EDA, EMG, RSP), providing user-friendly functions for feature extraction and analysis.

tools.name: ephypype
tools.one_line_profile: Electrophysiology analysis pipelines based on Nipype
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing pipelines for electrophysiology analysis (EEG/MEG), built on top of the Nipype framework to facilitate reproducible and scalable workflows.

tools.name: graphpype
tools.one_line_profile: Graph theoretical analysis pipelines for neuroimaging
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for graph theoretical analysis of neuroimaging data, designed to work within the Neuropycon ecosystem and Nipype framework.

tools.name: GEDAI
tools.one_line_profile: Generalized Eigendecomposition-based denoising plugin for EEGLAB
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB plugin for the EEGLAB toolbox that implements Generalized Eigendecomposition (GED) for denoising EEG data and separating signal from noise.

tools.name: Sarepy
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical techniques for ring artifact removal in tomography
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing numerical algorithms for removing ring artifacts in tomography images, enhancing the quality of scientific imaging data.

tools.name: spikesorting_fullpursuit
tools.one_line_profile: Neural spike sorting algorithm using iso-cut clustering and template matching
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the 'fullpursuit' spike sorting algorithm, designed to detect near-simultaneous spike events in raw voltage space using iso-cut clustering and template matching.

tools.name: preprocessing_pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing pipelines for EEG, fMRI, and MEG data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of preprocessing pipelines for neuroimaging data, utilizing MNE-python for EEG/MEG and nipype for fMRI, facilitating standardized data cleaning and preparation.

tools.name: TFSpectralGating
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow implementation of Spectral Gating for signal denoising
tools.detailed_description: A TensorFlow-based library implementing the Spectral Gating algorithm for denoising time-series signals, originally targeting audio but applicable to other signal types.

tools.name: TorchSpectralGating
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of Spectral Gating for signal denoising
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library implementing the Spectral Gating algorithm for denoising time-series signals, providing a differentiable implementation for integration into deep learning pipelines.

tools.name: eeghub
tools.one_line_profile: State machine framework for controlling EEG preprocessing steps
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based state machine tool designed to orchestrate and control EEG preprocessing workflows, integrating popular tools like FieldTrip, SPM, and EEGLAB.

tools.name: artrem
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithm for stimulation artifact removal in neural signals
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation for removing stimulation artifacts from electrophysiological recordings, addressing a specific noise reduction task in neural engineering.

tools.name: ValidEEG
tools.one_line_profile: Validation framework for ERP and oscillatory source reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: A versatile validation framework for evaluating Event-Related Potential (ERP) and oscillatory source reconstruction methods using FieldTrip, supporting methodological validation in EEG research.

tools.name: Promethium
tools.one_line_profile: AI-driven framework for seismic signal reconstruction and denoising
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework designed for geophysical data enhancement, specifically focusing on seismic signal reconstruction and denoising.

tools.name: openep-py
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for electrophysiology data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for analyzing electrophysiology data, likely targeting cardiac or neural electrophysiology, providing tools for data processing and analysis.

tools.name: Spikes.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia library for electrophysiology data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package designed for the analysis of electrophysiological data, specifically focusing on spike data processing.

tools.name: HEPLAB
tools.one_line_profile: ECG event detection tool for heartbeat evoked potential preprocessing
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB tool for detecting ECG events (R wave, T wave) specifically to assist in the preprocessing of heartbeat evoked potentials (HEP).

tools.name: CellExplorer
tools.one_line_profile: GUI and framework for exploring and classifying single cells from extracellular electrodes
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive graphical user interface and standardized processing module for exploring, classifying, and analyzing single-cell data acquired from extracellular electrodes.

tools.name: adaptive-gyro-filtering
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive notch filtering for gyro data motor noise suppression
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation of adaptive notch filtering designed to suppress motor noise in gyroscope data, applicable to sensor signal processing.

tools.name: sasdpr
tools.one_line_profile: Sparsity-assisted signal denoising and pattern recognition
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of sparsity-assisted methods for signal denoising and pattern recognition in time-series data.

tools.name: Detection-Label-Tool
tools.one_line_profile: Annotation tool for labeling wheat spikes in images
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for manually labeling wheat spikes in images, facilitating the creation of training datasets for agricultural computer vision models.

tools.name: hCNN
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid Neural Network toolbox for complex valued data
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB Neural Network toolbox that supports complex-valued data and allows the insertion of signal processing modules, enabling hybrid modeling approaches.

tools.name: botbots
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset of diverse dialogues between ChatGPT instances
tools.detailed_description: A dataset containing dialogues between ChatGPT instances with GPT-4 generated system messages, covering various contexts including abstract reasoning and brainstorming, useful for NLP research.

tools.name: KalmANF
tools.one_line_profile: Frequency tracker using Kalman filter and adaptive notch filter
tools.detailed_description: A frequency tracking algorithm implementation combining Kalman filtering with a single parameter adaptive notch filter.

tools.name: spladder
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for detection and quantification of alternative splicing events
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for the detection and quantification of alternative splicing events from RNA-Seq data, supporting complex splicing graph analysis.

tools.name: hear
tools.one_line_profile: High-variance Electrode Artifact Removal (HEAR) algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of the HEAR algorithm for removing high-variance electrode artifacts from electrophysiological data.

tools.name: bids-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for handling neuroimaging data in BIDS format
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools for organizing, validating, and processing neuroimaging data according to the Brain Imaging Data Structure (BIDS) standard.

tools.name: DAS-N2N
tools.one_line_profile: Self-supervised machine learning denoising for Distributed Acoustic Sensing (DAS) data
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning implementation for denoising Distributed Acoustic Sensing (DAS) signals without requiring clean ground truth data (Noise2Noise approach). It is designed for geophysical signal processing applications.

tools.name: Brain Time Toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for warping electrophysiological data from clock time to brain time
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox that warps electrophysiological data to align with internal brain dynamics ('brain time') rather than external clock time, facilitating the analysis of dynamic neural patterns in cognitive processes.

tools.name: PyPREP
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of the PREP pipeline for EEG data preprocessing
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing the standardized PREP pipeline for EEG data, including line noise removal, robust referencing, and bad channel interpolation.

tools.name: ICLabel
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic EEG independent component classification plugin for EEGLAB
tools.detailed_description: An EEGLAB plugin that automatically classifies independent components (ICs) of EEG data into categories such as brain, muscle, eye, and heart artifacts using a pre-trained neural network.

tools.name: PACTools
tools.one_line_profile: EEGLAB plugin for Phase-Amplitude Coupling (PAC) analysis
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for EEGLAB to compute and visualize Phase-Amplitude Coupling (PAC) in electrophysiological signals using various methods.

tools.name: SIFT
tools.one_line_profile: Source Information Flow Toolbox for multivariate causality analysis
tools.detailed_description: An EEGLAB-compatible toolbox for analyzing and visualizing multivariate causality and information flow between sources of electrophysiological activity (EEG/ECoG/MEG).

tools.name: dipfit
tools.one_line_profile: Source localization plugin for EEGLAB
tools.detailed_description: An EEGLAB plugin for performing dipole source localization on independent components of EEG data.

tools.name: EEGLAB
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive signal processing environment for electrophysiological data
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive open-source signal processing environment for analyzing electrophysiological signals (EEG, MEG, ECoG) running on MATLAB, featuring ICA, time-frequency analysis, and artifact rejection.

tools.name: EEGPrep
tools.one_line_profile: Automated preprocessing tool for human EEG data
tools.detailed_description: An automated preprocessing pipeline for human EEG data built on benchmarked EEGLAB functions, developed by SCCN.

tools.name: get_chanlocs
tools.one_line_profile: Electrode localization plugin using 3D head images
tools.detailed_description: An EEGLAB plugin for localizing EEG electrodes using 3D head images, leveraging the FieldTrip toolbox.

tools.name: neuroscanio
tools.one_line_profile: Neuroscan data import plugin for EEGLAB
tools.detailed_description: A function/plugin to import Neuroscan format data into the EEGLAB environment.

tools.name: nsgportal
tools.one_line_profile: EEGLAB plugin for Neuroscience Gateway (NSG) HPC access
tools.detailed_description: A plugin enabling EEGLAB users to submit jobs to the Neuroscience Gateway (NSG) high-performance computing resources directly from the interface.

tools.name: Osprey
tools.one_line_profile: All-in-one toolbox for magnetic resonance spectroscopy (MRS) data processing
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive MATLAB toolbox for the processing, analysis, and quantification of magnetic resonance spectroscopy (MRS) data.

tools.name: Elphas
tools.one_line_profile: Elephant identification and counting system
tools.detailed_description: A computer vision system designed for the identification and counting of elephants, supporting ecological and conservation research.

tools.name: ts-PWS
tools.one_line_profile: Time-scale phase-weighted stack for seismic signal denoising
tools.detailed_description: Software implementing time-scale phase-weighted stacking for denoising seismic signals, improving signal-to-noise ratio in geophysical data.

tools.name: sed-crnn
tools.one_line_profile: Sound event detection using convolutional recurrent neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning implementation for single and multichannel sound event detection (SED), serving as a winning method for the DCASE 2017 challenge.

tools.name: seld-net
tools.one_line_profile: Sound event localization and detection network
tools.detailed_description: A convolutional recurrent neural network for simultaneous localization, detection, and tracking of multiple overlapping sound events in 3D space.

tools.name: Sentiment Predictor for Stress Detection
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for detecting psychological stress from speech signals
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based model that detects psychological stress from voice/speech signals using CNNs and Mel-filter bank coefficients, applicable in affective computing and psychology.

tools.name: ecg-denoise
tools.one_line_profile: ECG signal denoising using machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning-based approach for denoising Electrocardiogram (ECG) signals, developed by SoftServe R&D.

tools.name: eeg-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-End EEG processing pipeline using MNE-Python
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for EEG data cleaning, filtering, ICA, and decoding analysis, built on top of the MNE-Python library.

tools.name: CountingSheepPSG
tools.one_line_profile: EEGLAB-compatible software for sleep stage scoring and PSG analysis
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based tool compatible with EEGLAB for manual and visual sleep stage scoring, signal processing, and event marking of polysomnographic (PSG) data. Developed by the Fogel Sleep Lab.

tools.name: EEG-pyline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for EEG data pre-processing, analysis and visualisation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline designed for neuroscience and mental health research to handle EEG data preprocessing, analysis, and visualization tasks.

tools.name: SALSA
tools.one_line_profile: Eigenvector-based feature extraction for sound event localization
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of SALSA features for polyphonic sound event localization and detection, often used in acoustic research and DCASE challenges.

tools.name: ERPLAB
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for analyzing Event-Related Potential (ERP) data
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Matlab package for analyzing ERP data, tightly integrated with EEGLAB to provide tools for processing, visualization, and analysis.

tools.name: RVT
tools.one_line_profile: Recurrent Vision Transformers for object detection with event cameras
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Recurrent Vision Transformers (RVT) for efficient object detection using neuromorphic event camera data.

tools.name: rpg_corner_events
tools.one_line_profile: Fast event-based corner detection algorithm
tools.detailed_description: Efficient C++ implementation for detecting corners in event-based vision streams, suitable for neuromorphic engineering applications.

tools.name: IronSmithQSM
tools.one_line_profile: Automated pipeline for Quantitative Susceptibility Mapping (QSM)
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for creating and processing QSM data, extracting iron concentrations from brain regions, and evaluating data quality.

tools.name: firfilt
tools.one_line_profile: FIR filter design routines for EEGLAB
tools.detailed_description: EEGLAB plugin providing routines for designing Windowed Sinc, Parks-McClellan, and Moving Average FIR filters for EEG data processing.

tools.name: mne_microstates
tools.one_line_profile: Microstate analysis for MNE-Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for performing EEG microstate analysis, designed to integrate with the MNE-Python ecosystem.

tools.name: brainstorm
tools.one_line_profile: Data augmentation for one-shot medical image segmentation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of learned transforms for data augmentation in one-shot medical image segmentation tasks.

tools.name: xdf-EEGLAB
tools.one_line_profile: EEGLAB plugin for importing XDF (Extensible Data Format) files
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the EEGLAB toolbox that enables the import of multi-modal data streams recorded in the Extensible Data Format (XDF), commonly used with the Lab Streaming Layer (LSL) ecosystem.

tools.name: mneflow
tools.one_line_profile: Neural networks for EEG/MEG decoding interface with MNE-Python and TensorFlow
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides an interface for training and evaluating neural networks on M/EEG data, bridging MNE-Python for data handling and TensorFlow for deep learning models.
